category.name: calendar.category
category.item: Do you really want to delete this category? All child categories of this category will be moved to this category’s parent category. Events which are only in this category will be deleted.
You can use this URL to subscribe with your favorite calendar software.

category.name: calendar.index
category.item: Calendar Software: WoltLab Calendar™{if SHOW_VERSION_NUMBER} {@PACKAGE_VERSION}{/if}, developed by WoltLab® GmbH

{#$stats[authors]} Author{if $stats[authors] != 1}s{/if} - {#$stats[events]} Event{if $stats[events] != 1}s{/if} ({#$stats[eventsPerDay]} Event{if $stats[eventsPerDay] != 1}s{/if} per Day) - {#$stats[comments]} Comment{if $stats[comments] != 1}s{/if}

category.name: calendar.user
category.item: Editing event {$event->subject}
Reading event {$eventDate->getEvent()->subject}

category.name: wcf.acl.option
category.item: Can add events to this category

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Can add and invite users to their events
Can invite entire user groups to their events
The user groups “Everyone”, “Guests”, and “Users” are not valid for invitations.
Can move their events to trash
Can disable comments on their events

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Featured events will be displayed for the following days.
Only events from the selected categories will be displayed in this box.
Upcoming events will be displayed for the following days.
Events are removed from the trash by the following days. Use 0 to disable.
Maximum Size of Invited User Groups
Use caution when inviting large user groups, as it requires more email notifications to be sent. Use a conservative value, otherwise, the process could time out.
The maximum number of categories per event.
Discussion threads will be created in the selected forum.
Create discussion threads for events in the selected categories only.

Discussion threads will be created in the specified forum, regardless of the selected categories. Disabling this feature allows you to edit the desired categories, and assign a specific forum to them.
Events can take place by the following days.
Display user’s event count in profile sidebar
Discussion threads are automatically created for each new event in the selected forum.

category.name: wcf.acp.rebuildData
category.item: Rebuilds the search index for the events and recalculates the activity points.

{if $like->isDislike()}Dislikes{else}Likes{/if} the event {$event->getTitle()}.
